price: 25 tandis que ceux qui croient et accomplissent de bonnes œuvres obtiendront une récompense dont ils ne seront jamais privés.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ أَجۡرٌ غَيۡرُ مَمۡنُونِۭ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun ghayru mamnūnin
